1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall -fno-warn-orphans #-}
2
3-- | Relkit constructors.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Construct
6  ( -- * General constructor
7    relkit, relkitId,
8    relkitUnfixed,
9    relkitSetCp,
10
11    -- * Flow relkit
12    relkitLine, relkitMany, relkitWhole,
13    relkitLineAb, relkitManyAb, relkitWholeAb,
14    relkitFilterAb,
15
16    -- * Confluent relkit
17    relkitConflLine, relkitConflMany, relkitConflWhole,
18    relkitConflFilter,
19
20    -- * Source of relation
21    relkitConst, relkitConstRel, relkitConstEmpty,
22    relkitConstSingleton, relkitConstBody,
23    relkitSource,
24
25    -- * Relation reference
26    relkitNest, relkitCopy, relkitLocal,
27  ) where
28
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax              as S
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                as T
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Relkit  as C
34
35
36instance Monoid (C.Relkit c) where
37    mempty = relkitConstRel T.reldee
38    mappend (C.Relkit _ _ bo1) (C.Relkit _ ho2 bo2) =
39        relkit ho2 $ C.RelkitAppend bo1 bo2
40
41-- ----------------------  General constructor
42
43-- | Construct relkit with output heading
44--   and relation-to-relation calculation.
45relkit :: Maybe T.Head -> C.RelkitCore c -> C.Relkit c
46relkit ho = C.Relkit Nothing ho . B.Codic []
47
48-- | Relkit for identity relmap.
49relkitId :: Maybe T.Head -> C.Relkit c
50relkitId ho = relkit ho C.RelkitId
51
52-- | Determinate relkit.
53relkitJust :: T.Head -> C.RelkitCore c -> C.Relkit c
54relkitJust = relkit . Just
55
56-- | Indeterminate relkit.
57--   This is used when input heading is indeterminate,
58--   therefore output heading cannot be determinate.
59relkitUnfixed :: B.Ab (C.Relkit c)
60relkitUnfixed = Right $ relkit Nothing C.RelkitId
61
62-- | Set relkit code position.
63relkitSetCp :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => cp -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
64relkitSetCp cp (C.Relkit hi ho (B.Codic _ core)) =
65    C.Relkit hi ho $ B.codic cp core
66
67
68-- ----------------------  Flow
69
70-- | Create non-abortble one-to-one (linear) relkit.
71relkitLine
72    :: Bool               -- ^ Remove duplication or not
73    -> T.Head             -- ^ Heading of output relation
74    -> C.Flow [c] [c]     -- ^ Flow function which converts tuples of relation
75    -> C.Relkit c         -- ^ Result relkit
76relkitLine u ho flow = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitLine u flow
77
78-- | Create non-abortble one-to-many relkit.
79relkitMany :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.Flow [c] [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
80relkitMany u ho flow = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitMany u flow
81
82-- | Create non-abortble whole-mapping relkit.
83relkitWhole :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.Flow [[c]] [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
84relkitWhole u ho flow = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitWhole u flow
85
86-- | Create abortable one-to-one (linear) relkit.
87relkitLineAb :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.FlowAb [c] [c] -> C.Relkit c
88relkitLineAb u ho flow = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbLine u (const flow) []
89
90-- | Create abortable one-to-many relkit.
91relkitManyAb :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.FlowAb [c] [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
92relkitManyAb u ho flow = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbMany u (const flow) []
93
94-- | Create abortable whole-mapping relkit.
95relkitWholeAb :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.FlowAb [[c]] [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
96relkitWholeAb u ho flow = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbWhole u (const flow) []
97
98-- | Create abortable filtering relkit.
99relkitFilterAb
100    :: T.Head             -- ^ Heading of output relation
101    -> B.AbTest [c]       -- ^ Teset function which determins keeping/omitting tuples
102    -> C.Relkit c         -- ^ Result relkit
103relkitFilterAb ho test = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbTest test
104
105
106-- ----------------------  Confluent
107
108-- | Create abortable one-to-one (linear) confluent relkit.
109relkitConflLine
110    :: Bool               -- ^ Remove duplication or not
111    -> T.Head             -- ^ Heading of output relation
112    -> C.Confl c [c] [c]  -- ^ Confluent function which merges multiple relations
113    -> [C.RelkitBody c]   -- ^ Relkit of subrelmaps
114    -> C.Relkit c         -- ^ Result relkit
115relkitConflLine u ho confl subs = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbLine u confl subs
116
117-- | Create abortable one-to-many confluent relkit.
118relkitConflMany :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.Confl c [c] [[c]] -> [C.RelkitBody c] -> C.Relkit c
119relkitConflMany u ho confl subs = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbMany u confl subs
120
121-- | Create abortable whole-mapping confluent relkit.
122relkitConflWhole :: Bool -> T.Head -> C.Confl c [[c]] [[c]] -> [C.RelkitBody c] -> C.Relkit c
123relkitConflWhole u ho confl subs = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbWhole u confl subs
124
125-- | Create abortable confluent filtering relkit.
126relkitConflFilter :: T.Head -> B.AbTest [[c]] -> C.RelkitBody c -> C.Relkit c
127relkitConflFilter ho test sub = relkitJust ho $ C.RelkitAbSemi test sub
128
129
130-- ----------------------  Source of relation
131
132-- | Relkit for constant relmap.
133relkitConst :: T.Head -> [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
134relkitConst he bo = relkitJust he $ C.RelkitConst bo
135
136-- | Relkit outputs constant relation.
137relkitConstRel :: T.Rel c -> C.Relkit c
138relkitConstRel (T.Rel he bo) = relkitConst he bo
139
140-- | Relkit for relmap which output empty relation.
141relkitConstEmpty :: [S.TermName] -> C.Relkit c
142relkitConstEmpty ns = relkitConstBody ns []
143
144-- | Relkit for relmap which outputs singleton relation.
145relkitConstSingleton :: [S.TermName] -> [c] -> C.Relkit c
146relkitConstSingleton ns tuple = relkitConstBody ns [tuple]
147
148-- | Relkit for constant relmap.
149relkitConstBody :: [S.TermName] -> [[c]] -> C.Relkit c
150relkitConstBody ns bo = kit where
151    he  = T.headFrom ns
152    kit = relkitJust he $ C.RelkitConst bo
153
154-- | Relkit for source relmap.
155relkitSource :: S.JudgeClass -> T.Head -> C.Relkit c
156relkitSource cl he = relkitJust he kit where
157    kit = C.RelkitSource cl $ T.getTermNames he
158
159
160-- ----------------------  Relation reference
161
162-- | Relkit with nested relation index.
163relkitNest :: S.Token -> [S.IndexTerm] -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
164relkitNest p nest (C.Relkit _ ho kitb) = relkit ho $ C.RelkitNest p nest kitb
165
166-- | Relkit for copy relmap.
167relkitCopy :: S.Token -> String -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
168relkitCopy p n (C.Relkit _ ho kitb) = relkit ho $ C.RelkitCopy p n kitb
169
170-- | Relkit for local relation reference.
171relkitLocal :: S.Token -> S.LocalRef -> T.Head -> C.Relkit c
172relkitLocal p n he = relkitJust he $ C.RelkitLocal p n
173
